short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web page downloader, which can save web pages to local machine as MHTML files that can be easily browsed offline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a web page preservation tools, which can save the web page in the current window as MHTML format and browse in offline state.
